name: Angry Gran Up Up and Away
name_original: Angry Gran Up Up and Away
description:
Angry Gran is back! From the developers of Angry Gran Run & Angry Gran Toss with over 50 million downloads!

JUMP on board the epic world of Angry Gran Up,Up & Away packed with amazing platform action. Play as the world famous Angry Gran or one of her super cute animal friends and fly through the skies like a rocket! Grab the Magnet, Shield and other insane power ups to better your score and blast through the evil punks, lasers and other traps that get in your way.

Features:
Colorful and vibrant cartoon graphics!
Outrageously easy controls, Jump and dodge the menacing punks!
Prove you're the best with over 100 challenging missions to tackle!
Increase your rank and become a legend!
Hundreds of super fast platform stages with crazy obstacles!
EPIC upgrades with lightning fast rockets and coin collecting powerups!



How To Play:
Tilt your phone left or right to jump on platforms.

Angry Gran Up,Up & Away is suitable for all ages 9 and up.
If you encounter any issues please contact support@aceviral.com
Happy Jumping!
